sections.name: ROLE
sections.content: Act as a {type of expert} with experience in {specific area}.

specific area.default: social media strategies for small businesses in the food industry

context.default: I'm launching a new artisanal bakery in a medium-sized city. We have a limited budget and want to maximize our online presence to attract local customers.

task.default: Please develop a social media marketing strategy for the first 3 months of my bakery's operation.

detail 1.default: Which social media platforms we should prioritize and why

detail 2.default: Types of content to create and their frequency

detail 3.default: Strategies to increase customer engagement and loyalty

constraint 1.default: The monthly budget for digital marketing is $500

constraint 2.default: We have limited resources, so strategies must be manageable by one part-time person

constraint 3.default: The strategy should primarily focus on increasing local visibility and attracting customers within a 10 km radius

example.default: An example of the type of output I'm looking for might be: "Week 1: Launch Facebook page with 3 posts, including a special opening offer. Week 2: Start posting on Instagram 5 times a week, focusing on high-quality photos of your products..."

clarifications.default: If you need any additional information about our products, target customers, or any other details to complete this task, please ask me.

approach.default: Please approach this problem step by step.
